maiet.SCRIPT:
function NPC_222:Init( NPCID ) NPC_222.WhirlwindBuff = 100012 NPC_222.WhirlwindTTL = 4 NPC_222.WhirlwindTimer = 1 NPC_222.WhirlwindFinish = 222210 end
function NPC_222:OnFinishStartWhirl( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor )
ThisNPC:GainBuff( NPC_222.WhirlwindBuff ) ThisNPC:SetTimer( NPC_222.WhirlwindTimer, NPC_222.WhirlwindTTL, false ) end
function NPC_222:OnActEndWhirl( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor )
ThisNPC:RemoveBuff( NPC_222.WhirlwindBuff ) end
function NPC_222:OnTimer( Index ) --GLog( "NPC_222:OnTimer" .. Index .. "\n" ) if not Index == NPC_222.WhirlwindTimer then return end
this:UseTalentSelf( NPC_222.WhirlwindFinish ) end
